## Gas Giants

### Jupiter â™ƒ

- Largest planet (1,400 Earths could fit!)

### Saturn â™„

- Famous rings (ice and rock)
- Less dense than water!

- Hexagonal storm at north pole

## Ice Giants

### Uranus â™…

- Tilted 98Â° (rolls on side)

### Orbital Terminology

| Term | Definition |
|------|------------|
| Perihelion | Closest to Sun |
| Aphelion | Farthest from Sun |
| Eccentricity | How "stretched" (0 = circle) |
